content.question: Some art historians have theorized that in the Justinian panel at San Vitale, the artist divided the figures into three distinct but equal groups in order to

choices.label: change the established hierarchy then governing the empire
represent the tripartite nature of God as the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit
serve as a visual exemplar for a more enlightened and liberated society with better laws
symbolize the need to balance imperial, military, and religious powers

content.answer: symbolize the need to balance imperial, military, and religious powers

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.5: Theories and Interpretations of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
